20110109000007.000|20110109000009.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Don, thanks very much.  We're 
20110109000009.000|20110109000012.000|TR0|watching what's happening. It's a dramatic 
20110109000012.000|20110109000014.000|TR0|story, unfortunately, a horrible story at 
20110109000014.000|20110109000017.000|TR0|the same time.  Our live coverage of 
20110109000017.000|20110109000020.000|TR0|today's breaking news continues right now.
20110109000020.000|20110109000022.000|TR0|
20110109000022.000|20110109000025.000|TR0|The shooting of Arizona Congresswoman 
20110109000025.000|20110109000028.000|TR0|Gabrielle Giffords.  She was shot in the 
20110109000028.000|20110109000030.000|TR0|head, but survived and was rushed into 
20110109000030.000|20110109000033.000|TR0|surgery.  Her doctor now says he is very 
20110109000033.000|20110109000035.000|TR0|optimistic about Giffords chances of 
20110109000035.000|20110109000038.000|TR0|recovery.
20110109000038.000|20110109000041.000|TR0|
20110109000041.000|20110109000043.000|TR0|A gunman opened fire while Giffords was 
20110109000043.000|20110109000046.000|TR0|meeting with her constituents at a grocery 
20110109000046.000|20110109000049.000|TR0|store parking lot in Tucson, Arizona.  Six 
20110109000049.000|20110109000051.000|TR0|of the victims are dead among them, a 
20110109000051.000|20110109000054.000|TR0|9-year-old girl and a federal judge.  
20110109000054.000|20110109000057.000|TR0|Giffords is among the 12 wounded.
20110109000057.000|20110109000059.000|TR0|
20110109000059.000|20110109000102.000|TR0|Police have a 22-year-old suspect in 
20110109000102.000|20110109000104.000|TR0|custody.  He's identified at Jared Lee 
20110109000104.000|20110109000107.000|TR0|Loughner.
20110109000107.000|20110109000110.000|TR0|
20110109000110.000|20110109000112.000|TR0|Here's what we know about today's events, 
20110109000112.000|20110109000115.000|TR0|how they unfolded.  Giffords public 
20110109000115.000|20110109000118.000|TR0|meeting was scheduled to run from 10:00 
20110109000118.000|20110109000120.000|TR0|a.m. until 11:30 a.m. Tucson time, that's 
20110109000120.000|20110109000123.000|TR0|noon to 1:30 p.m. Eastern.  She was at a 
20110109000123.000|20110109000125.000|TR0|Safeway store in northwestern Tucson.  
20110109000125.000|20110109000128.000|TR0|Authorities haven't said exactly when the 
20110109000128.000|20110109000131.000|TR0|shooting happened.
20110109000131.000|20110109000133.000|TR0|
20110109000133.000|20110109000136.000|TR0|CNN first confirmed the story at 1:05 p.m. 
20110109000136.000|20110109000139.000|TR0|Eastern Time, or 11:05 in Tucson.  By that 
20110109000139.000|20110109000141.000|TR0|time, helicopters had rushed some of the 
20110109000141.000|20110109000144.000|TR0|victims to Tucson hospitals.  CNN's first 
20110109000144.000|20110109000147.000|TR0|bulletin was at 1:28 p.m. Eastern, 11:29 
20110109000147.000|20110109000149.000|TR0|a.m. Tucson time.  That was the first 
20110109000149.000|20110109000152.000|TR0|bulletin that we had. That was 
20110109000152.000|20110109000154.000|TR0|unfortunately word that there had been 
20110109000154.000|20110109000157.000|TR0|this shooting and there were several 
20110109000157.000|20110109000200.000|TR0|people dead.  We did not know then what 
20110109000200.000|20110109000202.000|TR0|Gabrielle Giffords condition was.
20110109000202.000|20110109000205.000|TR0|
20110109000205.000|20110109000208.000|TR0|The next two and a half hours though of 
20110109000208.000|20110109000210.000|TR0|this story unfolded, including 
20110109000210.000|20110109000213.000|TR0|contradictory remarks, contradictory 
20110109000213.000|20110109000215.000|TR0|reports, including an original erroneous 
20110109000215.000|20110109000218.000|TR0|report that she had died.  Fortunately, 
20110109000218.000|20110109000221.000|TR0|she is alive.
20110109000221.000|20110109000223.000|TR0|
20110109000223.000|20110109000226.000|TR0|Gabrielle Giffords is relatively new to 
20110109000226.000|20110109000229.000|TR0|Capitol Hill, but not to public service.  
20110109000229.000|20110109000231.000|TR0|She was first elected to the U.S. House of 
20110109000231.000|20110109000234.000|TR0|Representatives in 2006, part of the 
20110109000234.000|20110109000237.000|TR0|Democratic wave that took control of both 
20110109000237.000|20110109000239.000|TR0|houses of Congress.  She was elected to 
20110109000239.000|20110109000242.000|TR0|the Arizona House in 2000 and the Arizona 
20110109000242.000|20110109000244.000|TR0|Senate in 2002.  At the time, she was 32 
20110109000244.000|20110109000247.000|TR0|years old, the youngest woman ever elected 
20110109000247.000|20110109000250.000|TR0|to that chamber.
20110109000250.000|20110109000252.000|TR0|
20110109000252.000|20110109000255.000|TR0|Giffords resigned from the Arizona Senate 
20110109000255.000|20110109000258.000|TR0|to run for Congress where she succeeded 
20110109000258.000|20110109000300.000|TR0|11-term Republican Jim Kolbe, who retired.
20110109000300.000|20110109000303.000|TR0|
20110109000303.000|20110109000306.000|TR0|In 2007, Gabrielle Gifford married an 
20110109000306.000|20110109000308.000|TR0|astronaut, Mark Kelly.  He's due to 
20110109000308.000|20110109000311.000|TR0|command the last mission of the space 
20110109000311.000|20110109000313.000|TR0|shuttle Endeavour that's scheduled in 
20110109000313.000|20110109000316.000|TR0|April.  Kelly's twin brother is also an 
20110109000316.000|20110109000319.000|TR0|astronaut, currently on the International 
20110109000319.000|20110109000321.000|TR0|Space Station.
20110109000321.000|20110109000324.000|TR0|
20110109000324.000|20110109000327.000|TR0|When members of Congress read the U.S. 
20110109000327.000|20110109000329.000|TR0|Constitution on the floor of the House 
20110109000329.000|20110109000332.000|TR0|this week, Congresswoman Giffords read the 
20110109000332.000|20110109000334.000|TR0|First Amendment. Among its guarantees is 
20110109000334.000|20110109000337.000|TR0|the right of the people to peaceably 
20110109000337.000|20110109000340.000|TR0|assemble. Listen to this.
20110109000340.000|20110109000342.000|TR0|
20110109000342.000|20110109000345.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)
20110109000345.000|20110109000348.000|TR0|

20110109000350.000|20110109000353.000|TR0|First Amendment: "Congress shall make no 
20110109000353.000|20110109000356.000|TR0|law respecting an establishment of 
20110109000356.000|20110109000358.000|TR0|religion or prohibiting the free exercise

20110109001517.000|20110109001520.000|TR0|to commands. But here's the question, 
20110109001520.000|20110109001523.000|TR0|Sanjay: Would they induce a coma?  Would 
20110109001523.000|20110109001525.000|TR0|that be a situation in this kind of 
20110109001525.000|20110109001528.000|TR0|condition?
20110109001528.000|20110109001530.000|TR0|
20110109001530.000|20110109001533.000|TR0|GUPTA:  The reason they typically would 
20110109001533.000|20110109001536.000|TR0|induce a coma, Wolf, is if there is a 
20110109001536.000|20110109001538.000|TR0|significant brain swelling, where the 
20110109001538.000|20110109001541.000|TR0|brain is just swelling so much against the 
20110109001541.000|20110109001544.000|TR0|hard surface of the skull, because the 
20110109001544.000|20110109001546.000|TR0|brain is encased by the skull, when it 
20110109001546.000|20110109001549.000|TR0|swells, it has nowhere to go. You have 
20110109001549.000|20110109001552.000|TR0|swelling in your abdomen, for example, 
20110109001552.000|20110109001554.000|TR0|your abdomen can distend, for example.  
20110109001554.000|20110109001557.000|TR0|But brain swelling, it's very significant 
20110109001557.000|20110109001559.000|TR0|problem -- we induce a coma to sort of put 
20110109001559.000|20110109001602.000|TR0|the brain to rest for a period of time.
20110109001602.000|20110109001605.000|TR0|
20110109001605.000|20110109001607.000|TR0|But that's done in a different situation, 
20110109001607.000|20110109001610.000|TR0|Wolf.  If she is following commands, if 
20110109001610.000|20110109001613.000|TR0|she's able to hear, respond in the way

20110109002446.000|20110109002449.000|TR0|would be so disturbing.  But they are in
